application-description: Select a supported application to import wallets, transactions, and categories from the application.
format-description: Select a supported format to import wallets, transactions, and categories from the application.
delimiter-description: Select a supported delimiter for data processing.
file-description: Select the file containing the data you want to import.
thousands-separator-description: Use the thousands separator to format the number in the file.
data-visualization-description: Show data as tabs after selecting file (uses more browser resources)
